properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 3:05PM CST until January 24 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Kansas City/Pleasant HIll MO
properties.description:
...Winter Weather Returns Today...

.A winter weather system bring light to moderate snow over
western Missouri and eastern Kansas through the early afternoon
before spreading to the entire area. Overall snow totals will be
1 to 2 inches over eastern Kansas and western Missouri with
central Missouri seeing closer to 3 to 5 inches.

* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations
of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze.

* WHERE...Pettis and Cooper Counties.

* WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 6 PM CST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM CST FRIDAY
